fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch Application
2. Platform > Database
3. Click on pre-packaged DB 

Actual Result:
Application Crashes

Expected Result:
Should not crash
fields.summary: Android: Database: Rhino only, Clicking on pre-packaged DB causes the application to crash
